channel.title: Music on 非淡泊无以明志，非宁静无以致远。
channel.description: Recent content in Music on 非淡泊无以明志，非宁静无以致远。

item.title: Take me to your heart
item.description: Hiding from the rain and snow Trying to forget but I won’t let go Looking at a crowded street Listening to my own heart beat So many people all around the world Tell me where do I find someone like you girl (Chorus) Take me to your heart take me to your soul Give me your hand before I’m old Show me what love is - haven’t got a clue
